it.unibz.pomodroid
Class SharedActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      it.unibz.pomodroid.SharedActivity
Direct Known Subclasses:
CleanDatabase, Pomodoro, Pomodroid, PomodroidTest, Preferences, Services
public abstract class SharedActivity
extends Activity

Base-class of all activities. Defines common behavior for all Activities of Pomodroid.

Author:
Daniel Graziotin 4801 , Thomas Schievenin 5701
